in my system, it is under:
/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/ and it points to libcuda.so.370.28. 370.28 comes from my driver version.
When you use APT to install cuda, libcuda ends up here.

Also:

$ echo $LD_LIBRARY_PATH
/usr/local/cuda:/usr/local/cuda/lib64:

I see that your LD_LIBRARY_PATH has two paths that are exactly the same. maybe thats the problem?

body:
in my system, it is under:
`/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/` and it points to `libcuda.so.370.28`. `370.28` comes from my driver version.
When you use APT to install cuda, libcuda ends up here.

Also:
```
$ echo $LD_LIBRARY_PATH
/usr/local/cuda:/usr/local/cuda/lib64:
```

I see that your LD_LIBRARY_PATH has two paths that are exactly the same. maybe thats the problem?
